article_node.title: Prince Harry demands to royals revealed before UK visit revealed — and one involves Meghan Markle: report
article_node.summary: Prince Harry has set a list of demands—full security, controlled press coverage, and formal recognition of Meghan as HRH—before agreeing to meet King Charles, a move that could influence UK political stability and market sentiment on UK governance and security costs.
